r01.name: Cave Entrance
r01.longDesc: A torch lit room with an entrance to the East.
r01.shortDesc: The cave entrance where you started.

r02.name: Neymar's Netherfield
r02.longDesc: Imbued with space-time magic, an open green field appears inside a cave. Standing in the field, Neymar waits the hero. To the East is the entrance to the next room.

r03.name: Thanos's Dungeon
r03.longDesc: An empty room with a rack holding some leather armour. There is a doorway to the South.
r03.lookDesc: You see a piece of leather armour hung on a rack.

r04.name: Aang's Air Domain
r04.longDesc: A large ruin with numerous white pillars surrounding a central pillar where Aang stands. There is a doorway to the South.
r04.shortDesc: The ruins of what seemed to be a temple...

r05.name: Chambers of the Unknown
r05.longDesc: There does not seem to be any enemies here, but there is a chest placed in the middle of the room. 2 exits on both the East and West side of the room
r05.shortDesc: An open room with a chest and 2 doorways, one to the East, the other to the West.

r06.name: Kratos's Colosseum
r06.longDesc: A large colosseum ahead, Kratos awaits in arena.
r06.lookDesc: You see Kratos, he is waiting for you.
r06.shortDesc: An open room home to Kratos's colosseum.

r07.name: The Forsaken Quarters
r07.longDesc: There does not seem to be any enemies here, but there is a chest placed in the middle of the room. You see another entrance to the south.
r07.shortDesc: An empty room with a chest and a doorway to the south.

r08.name: Phoenix's Fiery
r08.longDesc: A large platform surrounded by a lava lake, Rose awaits you. To the East, a doorway.
r08.shortDesc: A large platform surrounded by lava.

r09.name: T's Throne
r09.longDesc: A dimly lit cave. Killmonger is sitting on his throne waiting for a challenger. There are two doorways, one to the South, the other to the West.

r10.name: Assassination Room
r10.longDesc: A large hall filled with various obstacles blocking your vision, the room seems empty?
r10.lookDesc: You see Edward Kenway lying in ambush behind a boulder
r10.shortDesc: A large hall filled with obstacles.

r12.name: Thanos's Hallway
r12.longDesc: A long hallway filled with the treasures Thanos has collected.
r12.shortDesc: A long hallway filled with treasures.

r13.name: Thanos's Chamber
r13.longDesc: A grand room where Thanos stores all of his weaponry and armours. Thanos himself is waiting for you, seated on his grand throne.
r13.shortDesc: Thanos's Chamber, you see various weaponry and armours.
